Description: Stone (basalt ?) axe, much taller than it is broad with prominent 'wings'. It has a pitted surface, the result of erosion by the sand-laden wind.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Northern Dongola Reach, Site P17 locus 4453
Bibliographic references: Welsby 2001 / The Small Finds (859, p.381, fig.7.9)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Donated by: National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums (NCAM)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: SF:581 (small find number)
